seodesc: Tracking trends through metrics, unlocking insights.Finally, high cardinality data storage enables you to store and query a large number of metrics, giving you the flexibility and scalability to handle large-scale environments. Overall, long-term storage for Prometheus metrics in S3 can revolutionize the way you monitor and manage your infrastructure, providing powerful insights and unparalleled visibility.
